actions.committee: House Committee on Interstate and Foreign Commerce
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Interstate and Foreign Commerce.

official_title: A bill to extend the daylight saving time to the entire calendar year.

summary.text: Daylight Saving Time Act - Extends daylight saving time to the entire calendar year. Provides that any radio station which is only authorized to broadcast during the daily time period from sunrise to sunset according to regulations of the Federal Communications Commission, and which is not precluded by treaty from broadcasting at any time in addition to such period, may begin broadcasting with a presunrise service authorization from the Commission (from the last Sunday in October of each year through the day before the last Sunday in April of each year) one hour before the time it is so authorized to broadcast.

titles.title: A bill to extend the daylight saving time to the entire calendar year.
